1.content: you had gotten up you had been relaxing in the wild for the day in hopes of figuring out the rumors around a beast who killed the animals of the locals you would not be able to kill it but maybe reason with it you had been sleeping near some water as you heared a thud and a scream you got up picking up your old axe in case you look to the source of it to see a man on the floor and a dragon standing over him it is
1.title: the beginning

11.content:
it was mostly black with red bits on it to you you was like its foot hieght so it was about 40 to 50 feet you hoped nothing bigger was here you had seen that man a few days ago you was wondering what he was doing here he had not done anything so why is he dead and that dragon might eat him soon you stepped back a bit to here a crunching noise the dragon turned its head to you it had heared the noise and went up to you you fell over as you tried to get away from it it quickly pinned you to the floor
you know your kind does not come here they think i will eat them it said it was certanly female from the voice
you tried to back away but it had pinned you you dropped your axe in shock at this dragon
well are you going to run or stay or is it the shock and awe of seeing me she said
a bit of both you said trying to get up
i see she said having a chuckle after
what is so funny you managed to say
well there is the fact i see two humans the same day one and idiot and the other easy meat she said you looked at the man
he was a thief she said
i was trying to find the beast the local people say is killing there cattle you said
oh well you found me and you will regret it she said
why you say
i tend to eat your kind when possible nothing personal she said showing you some sharp teeth which were almost as big as your arm
don`t eat me i will do anything you said its teeth were next to you
11.title: black and red dragon utter hell

111.content:
she starts licking you as if to get a taste she then closes her mouth when you say you will do anything
anything she said
yes i will do anything just don`t eat me you plead
well i could use a slave she said
although you hated slavery it was now a situation of slavery or death you would rather live then die right now since she may make it agonizing
i could use a slave to clean my scales and my mouth she said
you was slightly scared you knew about her kind of dragon and the fact they enjoyed to hurt people a lot
and my caw could need cleaning she said
your what you said
my second stomach and you are willing to be my slave right she said you nodded
of course you say as you stopped fighting to get out of her grip
what is your name she said
will you said you were hoping she did assume that was short for willing
well i now own you and your name my name is obsidia or at least that is as close as you can get to it she said you remained quiet
understood slave she said
of course master you say
good now lets go it said
111.title: your new mistress obsidia

1112.content:
she quickly chucked you in her mouth you knew screaming would be useless you landed in what seemed like her stomach
welcome to me caw she said
what do i have to do master you said
clean it she ordered
with what you said
your tounge she said
fine you say getting to work
after 1 hour of work
i think i am done you said
well you can sleep in there she said
this is just plain evil you thought as you went to sleep
1112.title: your first job

choices: what she wants you to get her
11121.content:
this is weird you thought
you could hear her heartbeat you was surprised you slept at all
MASTER LET ME THE HELL OUT OF HERE you yelled
fine she said you could see some light as you went out
well i think you did a good job and you look better she said
how do i look better you said
you now look a lot more like a slave she said
oh you said
good now i am hungry she said you backed away a bit
i am not going to eat you she said
fine you said
11121.title: it is not a dream

111211.content:
what do you want master you said
i think i am in the mood for your kind you immediently stepped back
is this a problem she said showing her anger
i can`t trick them he said
are you refusing your masters wish she said you nodded you dreaded this
yes you said
well then she said hitting you with her claw it sent you into a rock you saw a mark on where she hit you it was bleeding heavy
will you do it now she said
of course you said
now i don`t care what kind as long as he is alive when you kill him or lead him here she said
what do you expect me to eat you said
i will find you some meat that is not human she said
seems fair he said
111211.title: cannableism

1112111.content:
great this is going to take getting use to he thought
he could not see many people most were scared he saw a watchmen he formed a plan
watchmen he said
what is it man he said
i saw someone dead or at least looks like it but i can`t carry him you need to help he said
fine lead the way he said
perfect he thought
2 hours later
so where is this dead guy he said
right here he said grabbing the mands dagger and stabbing him in the head
that was more simple then i thought he said picking him up
god guards are bloody stupid he said going up the mountain
1112111.title: easy tricks

11121111.content:
you are back she said
yeah i brought your food he said dropping the watchmen
it took two whole hours she said
it would have take less time if i could think a bit better and it would take longer if they were smart he said
what did you say to him she said
found a dead guy trick works on them each time he said
well here is your meet it said dropping a chicken
thanks he said
good meat this watchmen she said
i don`t want to know what he tastes like he said
fine but you need lessons she said
in what you said
you will see tomorrow slave she said
great lessons just what i need he said going to sleep

111211111.content:
get up she demanded
yes master you said getting up
FASTER she said you got up within a second
good she said
what do i have to do this time you ask
clean my mouth she said
fine you said as het tail picked you up
take off half of that stuff they smell she said taking off your boots and some other stuff
now get to work she said
fine he said going in
after an hour
i think i am done you said she flicked him down her throat
what the fuck you said

okay what the fuck you say
do you think i am done so easy she said
i was hoping that you said
this will be easy she said

well he should come to in 1 hour she thought
it is amusing this one she said

it has been an hour better spit him out she said as he came out
what the you said after releasing a growl
i see it worked she said you just kept growling
i would stop growling slave she said
you were getting annoyed how she kept driving you to obey just as you was about to answer back you remembered the last time you disobeyed her feeling the gash on your cheeks you shut up
good slave she said you was getting tired of being called that
stop calling me that you said attacking
so simple my slave she said grabbing you
you were trying to figure out why now you fought back after 2 days of being submissive you were fighting back now when you was most tired
i see your pride is acting up she said
i will deal with this pride of yours she said
how you say
11121111111.title: wierdest thing ever

111211111111.content:
she chucked you at the wall as soon as you got up she gashed you on the other side of your face
you got up and unleashed a growl
slave is pride that inportant that you would keep injured she said hitting you again you got up and charged as if life depended on it
that trick again she said hitting you you unleashed a growl
no one calls me slave you said your voice was weird
ha slave slave slave you can be worthless she said grabbing you
your pride was not worth your death and you tried to keep a calm head two words were coming to mind
i can`t have your pride acting up you need to forget this pride of yours she said
then what are you going to do you said
break you and your pride you are my slave if you like it or not pride or no pride she said
english please you said
in otherwords i break your mind and body she said
how much will that hurt you said
your body nearly done your mind boy nice knowing it she said attacking you knew fighting was futile when she had done you had more then 10 cuts on your body
you need to say certain words she said the first batch came in your head
mercy master you said in a submissive way
apoligize slave she said
i am sorry master forgive me you say bowing
good that should do it slave she said

1112111111111.content:
did you enjoy your lesson slave she said you just trigged on that was your lesson
no so just no more please you beg
i will do them if you disobey got it she said
yes master you say
clean my claws she said
yes master you said your gashes from "lesson" were atcing up as you did you just gritted it and kept telling yourself i don`t want more pain
i think you are done slave she said
yes master he said
go get my food she said
yes master he said grabbing a dagger and leaving
it feels good to be in charge she thought
great i have to be good to avoid a "lesson" you think to yourself

11121111111111.content:
those gashes will leave a mark he thought as he saw someone
of course the villige idiot he said going to him
follow me i have something you should see he said
yeah what he said
you will see you say
fine i might like this he said going after you
in the forest
so where are we he said
your death you muttered before stabbing him
this should be good for her he thought picking him up

111211111111111.content:
okay i am back master he said putting down the man
what was it this time she said
a mystery master he said
well here are some scraps she said he knew to eat what he could
by the way we need to go somewhere soon she said

to a place full of dragons as soon as she mentioned dragons
are they like you master you say
yes they are she said
will they try to kill me master you say
as long as you stay in line and be obedient and basiclly be submissive she said

yes slave so just stay quiet unless i ask you to speak and answer all questions to the truth she said
understood master when do we leave you say
now she said picking him up and flying off

okay master you said

11121111111111111.content:
obsidia landed and put you on the floor
greetings council she said

he can decieve other humans and helps me eat them she said
i see it said
what is his name said another
slave your human name she said
will master you say
i see what can he do besides be decietful it said
well besides being decietful he uses the axe when allowed she said
then here is a test slave it said
what is the test she said
chuck a throwing axe at a target over there he saw an axe next to him
yes master he said getting up and aiming it fired right in the middle
you are half decent slave it said they then saw the gashes
i see you had to do the lesson it said
yes his pride acted up so i got rid of it she said
i see how many times have you had to do the lesson it said
once he learns from his mistakes she said
well lets see how much pride he has left it said
how she said
do what you would do if he went out of line it said she nodded
slave did you just insult me do you want another lesson as soon as she said that you froze and crawled to her
forgive me master please you said bowing
that is how much pride is left in this slave it said
you are forgiven she said
thank you master he said
hardly a bit of pride he knows his supreiors it said
of course he does she said
well lets see how commited you are it said
how master you said
here is a slave he has been bad and i no longer have any patience for him it said
so you want me to kill him master he said it nodded
of course he said grabbing an axe and aiming it

slow slave it said he chucked the axe at his arm the scream was annoying the dragon it cast something and it no longer made a sound
that scream can be annoying continue it said
of course master he said chucking another at his other arm
do you want forgivness slave it said he nodded
hold your axe slave as son as it said he dropped it
beg for my forgivness it said to its slave allowing him to speak
i am sorry my might master please forgive me he said
fine since you are useful sometimes it said
thank you master he said
well he is half decent and obeys without objection what will he object to it said
this she said
you have an open shot do it she said he dropped the axe chucking it away

see he won`t harm us even with the chance she said
so he obeys your commands unless it involves harming you it said

near us even your slave can it said
thank you master you said

yes master you said going after her

yes maybe we can use him to out advantage said another

just relaxing that frail body of yours it said
yes master you said

master you say

to the council we can relax with them she said picking you up

as you and your master entered you followed behind her

i think i do master you say obviously showing your fear in this as you spot a girl and a dragon you seemed confused this girl was no slave
obsidia will you give your slave a lesson it said
of course she said going up to you you were forcing any pride left to stay down as she whacked you into the wall and then in two of your old gashes it made them deeper she then injured you in the same places as before you knew what to say
mercy master you said
apoligize she said

good she said
so what did we miss she said as you went to a rock to recover the woman went up to you
are you okay she said as she saw a deep gash
i have felt worse you said getting up your master noticed you and her talking and came up
i think you should leave him alone for a while she said the woman left
is your slave able to do what he can normally it said
of course master you said getting up this time you managed to climb up a bit of the wall and land perfectly as soon as you landed you felt some pain you then grabbed an axe and chucked it at the target
that is a yes she said
i see well can your slave climb me then so i can whisper to him it said
got it master you said you could tell where to climb you touched it soft enough not to irritate it and at the same time strong enough to hold on it then moved its arm you was on you held on barely and kept going it was deliberetly doing this you got to its shouldar
so what do you want to tell me master you said
i want you to tell that woman to beg our forgivness she said you jumped to the wall and scaled down
hello woman you said going to her
yes what is it she said
i was told to tell you to beg for forgivness and i would hurry they are not the most tolerate dragon you said
well tell them what will heppen if i don`t she said

she said what will happen if she don`t you said
tell her she will join that rider it said you did not ask for specifics and went down
or you will join that rider so you should you said
fine she said
she apoligized and they started talking

so we need to kill this one since he did that it said you picked up the word kill and you had an idea you climbed up the dragon you was used to climbing

i know a guy who can get some very dngerous poisons i could ask him for something to help you say
i see seems good can he get an untracelbe one it said

then we could take him captive win win situation you said

let me get this straight you want me to kill her you said they nodded
my pleasure you said grabbing your dagger and chucking it next to hers
more fair you said as she attacked you ducked you had your eyes closed dodgeing every attack you could see she was getting tired you then saw a few openings and hit them finishing with a few hits to the head then you kicked her neck out of position killing her the female and the male came up along with the other wolf`s you got out of the way as the alphas took some of her meat you were not hungry today nor would you ever eat human you just stayer were you was as they came up to you the female picked you up and took you off to an area you were perfectly fine they then put you between them keeping you warm luckily not crushing you you went to sleep
15111.title: the pair

151111.content:
you got up something in your pocket was doing something your sudden movment woke them up and they let you go for a second so you could reach it you was holding a coin
who is it you said to it
your brother antondios it said
put him through you said
hey will hows it going said a man
cut the talk why did you wake me up do you know what might happen now you said
no what he said you turned the coin and he saw the alphas
oh that he said
so what is this about you said
well the rest of your brothers have well killed themselves he said
hanging themselves again just cut the rope and bash them on the head they are far to fond of themselves to kill themselves you said
well okay so what time should i call he said
between 10 am and 6 pm got it you said
sure but you have no idea what claw did this time he said
another pub brawl did it require the rest of you to restrain him or did you just get banned you said
both he said
is that all you said
yeah you should get to sleep bye he said you put the coin back in your pocket
that should be everything sorted you said it then came back
oh yeah by the way meeting in a few months be there he said
good bye you said cutting him off and going back over to them who just put you back and went to sleep
another meeting how do we do that when i am here you thought
151111.title: your brother

1511111.content: you wake up to see two sets of eyes over you you could tell it was the alphas you got up in a split second they seemed amused at your reflexes to it it looked 9 to you which meant 1 hour before your brother starting telling you what was happening you held onto the coin it had over things besides being able to contact others with it but you sometimes forgot them you just put it back it would retain much of your memory at least you felt yourself getting picked up by
1511111.title: another day

15111111.content:
as the alpha picked you up you felt some pain but no complaints for the reason he had you in the perfect position to chuck you in the air and dead in one gulp he bounded off to some water you could see what he was going to do
you cannot be serious you said as he chucked you in luckily you was wearing your leather and not any armour you could easily manage to swim in this you could tell where any rapids were and where the fish were you dived down for a second to be out of the alphas sight you then came back up with a fish he nodded and you came back with it he seemed content with you and led you back after you gave him it he quickly ate it for a regular wolf it would take two bites but this size he only had to swallow he then picked you up and you went back to the den and gave you to his mate to look after he then left
15111111.title: seeing what you can do

151111111.content:
you could tell where you was going from some tracks you could see another track from the print it was a bear which had been after her prey it led you to an area in the open you could see the bear and you had a plan as she put you down
attack it from behind i will distract it you told her going near it the bear saw you you just stood there as it pulled a threat you just laughed as it attacked
now if i get this right you thought going up a tree
can`t you reach me you said to it you the jumped on it`s back you had managed to grab your dagger and you hit both it`s arms at the top and the bottom it managed to knock you into a tree full force you went through the tree and into a rock you then saw the alpha and some others finish it off you blanked out
151111111.title: to the forest

1511111111.content:
do you think he is breathing said a voice
boy that was one nasty bruise said another
i have felt worse you said getting up
you are awake said one of them
yeah takes more then getting whacked into a tree and rock to get rid of me you said getting up to see they were some wolfs
so how can you survive that said one
i have survived getting hit by a boulder and pretty much feeling death all that happens is i get knocked out you said
well how come you now understand said one
you looked in your pocket
hey have you guys seen a coin gold one side blue the other red you said
yeah this it said passing you it
well if my brother did what i think he did then once one of you touches it i can understand its language you said
is your brother a genius it said
no just really good at understanding and making things to help the rest of my family and those which i care for and i can tell from the lack of injury`s it worked that bear is dead you said
yeah why did you do that anyway it said
looking out for the pack plus i knew i would survive one way or another you said as you felt the bruise
you are right it is a nasty one you said
well the alpha female left and told us that if you are still living to take you back it said picking you
fine lets go so that i can relax you said as they darted off with you
1511111111.title: hours later

15111111111.content:
alpha we are back said the one holding you
i take it you are alive he said
yeah as alive as i can be alpha you said
he can now understand us and for once a human did not freak out it said
you freak out the first time you understand another creatures language but after that easy to deal with you said your coin was glowing
what is the time you ask
i think 5 it said
great i can`t have a go at him you said as his image appeared
dude you okay i have been trying to contact you he said
yeah kind of been knocked out you said
well either way we need to meet soon he said
can`t this wait till the meeting you said
no i don`t think this can we will be there in 2 weeks he said
why what happened you said
look this involves our enemy`s and lots of info which i cannot explain through this he said
okay see you in a few weeks you said as it cut off
great if it involves them and changing the meeting important you thought
so what is this about said the alpha male
all that is needed to know right now is that you will be getting more then 5 humans coming here in a few weeks who are here to see me you said as you felt your bruise
let me guess the injury from fighting that bear said the alpha female
yeah don`t hurt when you don`t touch it you said as she picked you up
i am getting use to this you said
15111111111.title: to the den again

151111111111.content:
get up said a voice
just 5 more minutes please you said
get up said another voice you knew who this voice belonged to and got up
that worked he said
well my bruise seems to be gone you thought feeling where it should be
well thanks to you we ate bear and deer he said
thanks let me guess so good none left you said they nodded
figures you said
don`t worry but i am surprised you are hardly hungry she said
i can just get fruit or fish easy so i am not minding you said
well we have more training he said picking you up
i guessed as much you said as you bounded off
151111111111.title: a new day

1511111111111.content:
do you want me to get some fish alpha you said
sure he said chucking you in
hmm decent fish over there not near rapids collect about 3 for me 20 for him will take 5 runs you thought diving you managed to chuck them to land and did that 4 times more you then swam back
3 fish for me 20 for you how does that sound you said
decent he said quickly eating his you managed to eat yours almost as fast
ha you actually hide your hunger he said
yeah works you said
yeah if you don`t show it he said
well we should head back he said picking you up
when you got back you were given to alpha female
1511111111111.title: fishing

15111111111111.content:
so what do i have to do you said
well since i can tell you have done some work we are meeting the pack she said
sure why not you said
hello alpha said a familiar voice it was the one who had helped you after your fight
hello fleetfoot she said
i take it you recovered it said
yeah my bruise is gone mostly you said
i see well alpha should i take him from here it said
sure show him round the pack she said putting you down fleetfoot picked you up being gentle or at least compared to the alpha male nice you had just from observing which ones held respect and ones which held hate this one held respect at the moment as had most of those you had met after you got knocked out at least you had not met one with hate or at the least killing you for even being near them hate this one seemed to hold more then respect respect was neutral above that was likeness and below was hate in your mind with most in respect and only a few in hate along with the alpha pair and this one in like it stopped for a second and put you down you could see 2 more you could tell they were either in respect or like which was a relieve for you
hello fleetfoot said one
i take it the males are off hunting again it replied
yeah just us why have you got him with you anyway said the wolf
told to by the alpha female it said
actually you volunteered you said
well either way this is digger and proudsong it said
nice to meet you they said you had guessed they were female from the fact fleetfoot had said that
same you said as your coin glowed they seemed confused you picked it up
is it antondios again you said
yes it said
put him through you said
hey bro he said
this had better be important brother you said
well he said
look if this is a question on how i am doing then i am doing fine and don`t call unless it involves the meeting or something important if you call again i will cut you off full stop got it you said
fine what about the others he said
if it applies to you it will apply to them good bye you said cutting him off
what was that about said fleetfoot
my brother it gets annoying but i do it part of my code you said
along with protecting your family and those you care for said fleetfoot
pretty much you said
well we had might as well rest here till the lads are back said fleetfoot lying down
i will be over there you said going to a rock they seemed to acknowledge it and lied down
15111111111111.title: meeting the pack

151111111111111.content:
we are back girls said a voice you woke up as soon as you saw them you could tell only one held hate right now
why have you got the meatbag here said the one who held hate
nice to meet you to you said
could you keep calm silverfang said another male this one was in respect
fine but my question still stands he said
i was told to meet the pack you said
under the alpha females orders said fleetfoot
i see well you and silverfang have met i can tell said the male
this is runningwater said silverfang
nice to meet you you said
same he said at least this one was more friendly
well fleetfoot you should take him back to the alphas you don`t want me to get a bit aggressive said silverfang
i have survived a lot silverfang i don`t intend to die yet so see you you said as fleetfoot picked you up and darted off
151111111111111.title: a few hours later

1511111111111111.content:
hello alphas said fleetfoot
so how did it go said the alpha male
everyone was okay with him except silverfang she said
well silverfang hates outsiders but he will get used to you said the alpha female you were not paying attention you could feel something you touched the ground for a second
i think we have some intruders alpha you said as you got up
what kind he said
2 legged that is the best i can tell and about 5 you said grabbing your dagger and preparing to go and see what it is
2 minutes later
hold on a minute they are you said
1511111111111111.title: back to the alphas

15111111111111112.content:
they were your family`s enemy the slayers you jumped down
you know you guys have courage to come after the leader of my family i will give you a round of applause for that you said they drew there weapons
please we can take you down no problem sad the leader
5 slayers versus me to easy for me you said as the alphas came with the rest of the pack
even if you beat me you won`t survive them you said
we could hunt them down like we hunted you and your family down he said
you cannot best a single one of us you said the alphas seemed curious about this
enough talk said a man charging with a spear you jumped on it and kicked his head and it snapped
you have one chance to come quietly said the leader
first rule of my family never retreat from your lot second rule sacrifice yourself for the family and friends and third rule kill off your family no matter the cost you said you were unarmed but in a weird position as two attacked you dodged both and kicked them to the floor
who is next you said grabbing a spear two more attacked you unleashed a roar and killed them with one hit you the prepared to chuck your spear at the leader
you don`t have the guts he said as more men appeared
try me you said as they attacked they began an assault at least 10 of them at once
what no elite guards i thought you guys had more money then just recruiting militia you said
i am an elite guard said the leader
wow if a uniform makes a man you are a really crappy man you said
you can`t talk he said
i am now you say i don`t have the guts you won`t have any guts when i am done you said
ha you have not even injured my guards yet he said as his men got tired
my turn you said quickly dispatching them and grabbing the spear to chuck it you chucked it and he got pinned the alphas came down
meet the owners of this territory slayer you said they quickly killed him and the pack ate what was left of the men
to easy you said
what was that about asked fleetfoot
i will tell you tomorrow you said
will you make him tell alpha
going to have to said the alpha male
boy i can`t wait to see how this turns out said the alpha female
15111111111111112.title: your enemy`s the slayers

151111111111111121.content:
damm slayers they can never leave my family alone you muttered
so who were they said the alpha male
we call them slayers what started as a simple refusal after 10 years erupted into a secret war you said
what was the refusal said the female
they wanted my ancestors to pay them a tribute of gold our spolis of war to them you said
and your ancestors refused said the male
aye we may have lost our lands and most of our power but we are paying them back for ir you said
with what said the female
we have decimated there armies for 100 years and we still are but our numbers are getting lower and we are now resorting to being sneaky the meeting being called early can mean only one thing you said
a call to war i bet she said you nodded
it is a vow my family take to always be there when it involves them you said
i see and they will come here why said the male
they changed the meeting and arranged to come here means we were found and that they need a new home and as most of my brethren are there and i am one of the only ones not there they chose this place becasue they know i am here and so do the slayers you said
so what do you have planned to kill them said the alpha male
well lets see you have met there basic units no match for me 1 year ago there were few elite guard it will take more then a year for them to gather a big enough elite guard to match me you said
i see so nothing for us to be worried about said the alpha male
i will check with my brother you said as your coin glowed
and i thought you was not going to call brother he said
brother slayers have found me here do they have anything to take down this pack you said
not as far as we know and if there guards fell to your blade then god knows how they will survive your big friends he said
good i needed to know it speed up th meeting to as soon as possible got it you said
we were planning on doing that anyway brother he said
good when will you be here you asked
in about a week with some new comrades he said
okay then bye you said
so in a week we will get a lot of your brethren here said the female
yeah but only one will kick up a fight i hope you said
i see well is he easy to manage said the male
just takes few hits on him and he falls in line just don`t let him get drunk on well anything it takes two of us to keep him under control you said
well let us sleep she said
yeah a good slaughter is always followed by a good rest you said going to sleep
151111111111111121.title: your past revealed

info.brief_description: okay this one should be half decent i hope
info.description:
okay so this one is basically getting captured and being stuck with a dragon the caracters name is a basicone this time and there is not as much violence

p.s if the wolf option is on here it is becasue it saves more space so please don`t complain about it
p.ss check my bio block i have an offer
